item.title: Jenn add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "You cannot be really first-rate at your work if your work is all you are." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle." -- Plato

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "There is no abstract art. You must always start with something. Afterward you can remove all traces of reality." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Marcus Eder
item.description: "Pop music is like fast food. It's always available quickly and might even taste good while you're eating it...but eventually you're going to shit it out and see it for what it really is--all the packaging in the world can't cover up the fact that it's excrement." -- Marcus Eder

item.title: Jenn add a quote by S.W. Lothian
item.description: "Peace is a fine balance â€“ like a feather standing on its end. It only takes a small breeze to tip it over. But once that has occurred, it is much harder to stand the feather on its end again. Trust is damaged and respect dissolved. - Horus, King of the Gods" -- S.W. Lothian

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Joseph Brodsky
item.description: "There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them." -- Joseph Brodsky
